title: Functional Prototype and Packaging Design
guardrails: Follow the approved IP and design guidelines.
Ensure all deliverables meet quality and licensing standards.

tasks.description: Perform the task 'Refine prototype to functional standard (reliable play loop).' by creating the deliverables specified for this task and ensuring they meet the acceptance criteria.

acceptance.text: Play loop repeatable ≥5 consecutive times without failure.

acceptance.text: The deliverable is complete and accurate.

acceptance.text: The deliverable is complete and accurate.
Reviewed and approved by the project lead.
